department: Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Purchase and delivery of a fully operational remotely piloted aircraft system (RPAS) (i.e., drone system) with photogrammetry and LiDAR payloads required for the Integrated Marine Response Planning Program.
full_summary:
# Eخصص
## F6160-230010 Enterprise Drone and Accessories
### Solicitation Number: WS4511540105

**Brief Description:**

Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO), St. John’s, Newfoundland and Labrador, invites proposals to acquire and deliver a fully operational remotely piloted aircraft system (RPAS) with photogrammetry and LiDAR payloads for the Integrated Marine Response Planning Program (IMRP).

**Contract Timeline:**

* Expected contract start date: 2024-04-19
* Expected contract end date: Not specified

**Bidder Selection Criteria:**

The selection criteria are:
* Lowest price (best value)
* Competitive evaluation based on pre-determined evaluation factors (see solicitation document)

**Trade Agreements:**

Purchasers are subject to Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and/or other trade agreements as specified in the procurement documents.

**Regions of Delivery:**

Goods will be delivered to St. John’s, Newfoundland and Labrador.

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Lyne Leger, PWGSC/PWSC
* Email: [lyne.leger2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lyne.leger2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Note: No phone or fax number is indicated.

**Procurement Documents:**

Access the solicitation documents and bid submission process via the Ariba Online Bidding System at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19444620?extsite=MTk0NDQ2MjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Notice:**

Notices and updates will be posted on this website.

**RSVP:**

Please address any correspondence to the Contracting Authority's contact person at the above email address.

 End of the notice
